remarks: Properties that determine a complete metric space.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)
statement:
iscmet3i.2 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
iscmet3i.3 $e |- D e. ( Met ` X ) $.
iscmet3i.4 $e |- ( ( f e. ( Cau ` D ) /\ f : NN --> X ) -> f e. dom ( ~~>t ` J ) ) $.
iscmet3i $p |- D e. ( CMet ` X ) $.
$d D f $.
$d J f $.
$d X f $.
